name: Marc Anthony
description:
'''Marco Antonio Mu√±iz''' (born September 16, 1968), known professionally as '''Marc Anthony''', is an American singer and actor. He is the top selling [[salsa music|salsa]] artist of all time. A four-time [[Grammy Award]], eight-time [[Latin Grammy Award]] and twenty-nine-time [[Lo Nuestro Awards]] winner (the most of any male), he has sold more than 12 million albums worldwide.

Known for his Latin salsa numbers and ballads, Anthony's achievements have been honored through various recognitions. He was the recipient of the 2009 [[Congressional Hispanic Caucus Institute]] (CHCI) Lifetime Achievement Award. He also received the 2009 CHCI Chair's Lifetime Achievement Award on September 16, 2009. He holds the [[Guinness World Records|Guinness World Record]] for best-selling tropical/salsa artist and the most number-one albums on the ''Billboard'' [[Tropical Albums]] year-end charts. He is also the artist with the most number one songs on the [[Latin Tropical Airplay|''Billboard'' Latin Tropical Airplay]] chart with 32 songs.
